original.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Auto enable OCR workaround (enable automatic OCR workaround for heavily scanned documents)
original.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: Auto term extraction is disabled. Term extraction settings below will not take effect until it is enabled.
original.Character pattern to identify formula te: Character pattern to identify formula text (regex, not recommended to change)
original.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Disable rich text translation (maybe improve compatibility)
original.Effective only when a page range is spec: Effective only when a page range is specified.
original.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Font pattern to identify formula text (regex, not recommended to change)
original.Force split short lines into different p: Force split short lines into different paragraphs
original.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Handle alternating line numbers and text paragraphs in documents with line numbers
original.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used as the number of workers
original.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: IoU threshold for identifying non-formula lines
original.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Maximum number of requests processed simultaneously
original.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Maximum pages per part (for auto-split translation, 0 means no limit)
original.Most API providers provide this paramete: Most API providers provide this parameter, such as OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
original.Number of requests sent per second: Number of requests sent per second
original.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR workaround (experimental, will auto enable Skip scanned detection in backend)
original.Only include translated pages in the out: Only include translated pages in the output PDF.
original.Primary font family for translated text: Primary font family for translated text
original.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Protection threshold for figures and tables (lines within figures/tables will not be processed)
original.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Put translated pages first in dual mode
original.RPC service for document layout analysis: RPC service for document layout analysis (optional)
original.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Remove non-formula lines within paragraph areas
original.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Select the rate limit mode that best suits your API provider, system will automatically convert the rate limiting values of RPM or Concurrent Requests to QPS and Pool Max Workers when you click the Translate button
original.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Skip formula offset calculation during processing
original.Split threshold factor for short lines: Split threshold factor for short lines
original.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Use alternating pages for dual PDF
original.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh-CN native translator who needs to fluently translate text into zh-CN.

zh.Effective only when a page range is spec: 仅在指定页面范围时有效。
zh.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 处理带行号文档中的交替行号与文本段落
zh.Free translation service provided by [Si: 由 [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn) 提供的免费翻译服务
zh.Character pattern to identify formula te: 用于识别公式文本的字符模式（正则表达式，不建议更改）
zh.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 每部分最大页数（用于自动拆分翻译，0 表示无限制）
zh.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: 自动术语提取功能已禁用。下方术语提取设置需启用此功能后方可生效。
zh.Most API providers provide this paramete: 大多数 API 提供商都提供此参数，例如 OpenAI GPT-4:500 RPM
zh.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 增强兼容性（自动启用 skip_clean 和 disable_rich_text）
zh.Maximum number of requests processed sim: 同时处理的最大请求数
zh.RPC service for document layout analysis: 用于文档布局分析的 RPC 服务（可选）
zh.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 如果未设置或设置为 0，QPS 将用作工作线程数量
zh.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): 跳过清理（可能提升兼容性）
zh.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 处理时跳过公式偏移计算
zh.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 移除段落区域内的非公式行
zh.Put translated pages first in dual mode: 在双语模式下优先显示翻译后的页面
zh.Translate table text (experimental): 翻译表格文本（实验性功能）
zh.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: 使用交替页面进行双页 PDF 阅读
zh.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: 请选择最适合您 API 提供商的速率限制模式，点击翻译按钮后系统将自动将 RPM 或并发请求的限流值转换为 QPS 和池最大工作线程数
zh.save automatically extracted glossary: 保存自动提取的术语表
zh.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 变通方案（实验性，将在后端自动启用“跳过扫描检测”）
zh.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: 例如：/no_think 你是一名专业的简体中文母语译者，需要流利地将文本翻译为简体中文。
zh.Force split short lines into different p: 强制将短行拆分为不同段落
zh.Download automatically extracted glossar: 下载自动提取的词汇表
zh.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: 禁用富文本翻译（可能提升兼容性）
zh.Non-formula line IoU threshold: 非公式线条 IoU 阈值
zh.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: 自动启用 OCR 变通方案（为重度扫描文档启用自动 OCR 变通方案）
zh.Term pool max workers: 术语池最大工作线程数
zh.Term RPM (Requests Per Minute): 术语 RPM（每分钟请求数）
zh.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 用于识别非公式行的 IoU 阈值
zh.Only include translated pages in the out: 仅在输出 PDF 中包含已翻译的页面。
zh.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 图表保护阈值（图表内文字将不被处理）
zh.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 用于识别公式文本的字体模式（正则表达式，不建议更改）

zh-TW.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: 自動啟用 OCR 解決方案（針對重度掃描文件啟用自動 OCR 解決方案）
zh-TW.Character pattern to identify formula te: 用於識別公式文字的字元模式（正規表示式，不建議更改）
zh-TW.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: 自動術語擷取功能已停用。下方的術語擷取設定需啟用此功能後才會生效。
zh-TW.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: 停用豐富文字翻譯（可能提升相容性）
zh-TW.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 增強相容性（自動啟用 skip_clean 和 disable_rich_text）
zh-TW.Force split short lines into different p: 強制將短行分割為不同段落
zh-TW.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 用於識別非公式行的 IoU 閾值
zh-TW.Effective only when a page range is spec: 僅在指定頁面範圍時有效。
zh-TW.Download automatically extracted glossar: 下載自動擷取的詞彙表
zh-TW.Maximum number of requests processed sim: 同時處理的最大請求數量
zh-TW.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 用於識別公式文字的字型模式（正規表示式，不建議更改）
zh-TW.Non-formula line IoU threshold: 非公式線 IoU 閾值
zh-TW.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 每個部分的最大頁數（用於自動分割翻譯，0 表示無限制）
zh-TW.Free translation service provided by [Si: 由 [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn) 提供的免費翻譯服務
zh-TW.Primary font family for translated text: 翻譯文字的主要字型系列
zh-TW.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 若未設定或設為 0，將使用 QPS 作為工作執行緒數量
zh-TW.Most API providers provide this paramete: 大多數 API 供應商都會提供此參數，例如 OpenAI GPT-4:500 RPM
zh-TW.Put translated pages first in dual mode: 在雙重模式中將已翻譯頁面置於優先
zh-TW.RPC service for document layout analysis: 用於文件版面分析的 RPC 服務（可選）
zh-TW.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 處理期間略過公式偏移計算
zh-TW.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 處理帶有行號的文件中的交替行號與文字段落
zh-TW.Term pool max workers: 詞彙池最大工作執行緒數
zh-TW.Translate table text (experimental): 翻譯表格文字（實驗性功能）
zh-TW.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: 使用交替頁面進行雙頁 PDF 處理
zh-TW.save automatically extracted glossary: 儲存自動擷取的詞彙表
zh-TW.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 移除段落區域內的非公式行
zh-TW.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: 例如：/no_think 你是一位專業的中文母語譯者，需要流暢地將文字翻譯成中文。
zh-TW.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: 請選擇最適合您 API 供應商的速率限制模式，點擊「轉換」按鈕後，系統會自動將 RPM 或併發請求的限流值轉換為 QPS 和池最大工作線程數。
zh-TW.Only include translated pages in the out: 僅在輸出 PDF 中包含已翻譯的頁面。
zh-TW.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): 跳過清理（可能提升相容性）
zh-TW.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 圖表和表格的保護閾值（圖表/表格內的線條將不被處理）
zh-TW.Term RPM (Requests Per Minute): 術語 RPM（每分鐘請求數）
zh-TW.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 因應措施（實驗性，將自動在後端啟用跳過掃描偵測）

ja.Custom System Prompt: カスタムシステムプロンプト
ja.## Translation Options:
## 翻訳オプション

特定の用語については以下の翻訳を厳守してください：
- 「Immersive Translate」は「没入型翻訳」と翻訳すること
ja.Disable monolingual output: 単一言語出力を無効にする
ja.Download Translation (Mono): 翻訳のダウンロード (モノ)
ja.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: リッチテキスト翻訳を無効にする（互換性が向上する可能性あり）
ja.Effective only when a page range is spec: ページ範囲が指定されている場合にのみ有効
ja.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 互換性を向上（skip_clean と disable_rich_text を自動で有効化）
ja.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 非数式行を識別するための IoU 閾値
ja.Force split short lines into different p: 短い行を強制的に別の段落に分割する
ja.Minimum text length to translate: 翻訳する最小テキスト長
ja.Maximum number of requests processed sim: 同時処理可能な最大リクエスト数
ja.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 一部あたりの最大ページ数（自動分割翻訳用、0 は無制限を意味します）
ja.Non-formula line IoU threshold: 非数式行 IoU 閾値
ja.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 設定されていない場合、または 0 に設定されている場合、QPS がワーカー数として使用されます。
ja.Follow main translation engine: メイン翻訳エンジンに従う
ja.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 行番号付き文書内の行番号とテキスト段落の交互処理
ja.Only include translated pages in the out: 出力 PDF には翻訳されたページのみを含めてください。
ja.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: OCR 自動回避策を有効にする（スキャン文書が多い場合に自動で OCR 回避策を有効化）
ja.Most API providers provide this paramete: 多くの API プロバイダーがこのパラメータを提供しています。例：OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
ja.Number of requests sent per second: 1 秒あたりのリクエスト送信数
ja.QPS (Queries Per Second): QPS (1 秒あたりのクエリ数)
ja.Put translated pages first in dual mode: デュアルモードで翻訳ページを先に表示
ja.RPM (Requests Per Minute): RPM (1 分あたりのリクエスト数)
ja.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 回避策（実験的機能、バックエンドでスキップスキャン検出を自動的に有効にします）
ja.RPC service for document layout analysis: 文書レイアウト分析用 RPC サービス（オプション）
ja.Custom prompt for translation: 翻訳用カスタムプロンプト
ja.Skip formula offset calculation: 数式オフセット計算をスキップ
ja.Term QPS (Queries Per Second): QPS (1 秒あたりのクエリ数)
翻訳を開始しています...
ja.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): クリーンアップをスキップ（互換性が向上する可能性あり）
ja.Split threshold factor for short lines: 短い行の分割閾値係数
ja.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 段落領域内の数式以外の行を削除
ja.Term rate limit mode: 用語レート制限モード
ja.Term pool max workers: タームプールの最大ワーカー数
ja.Skip scanned detection: スキャンされた検出をスキップ
ja.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: 双方向 PDF に交互ページを使用
ja.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 処理中に数式オフセット計算をスキップ
ja.Term RPM (Requests Per Minute): 用語 RPM (1 分あたりのリクエスト数)
ja.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 図表の保護しきい値（図表内の行は処理されません）
ja.Translate table text (experimental): 表内テキストを翻訳（実験的機能）
ja.save automatically extracted glossary: 自動抽出された用語集を保存
ja.Translation cancelled: 翻訳がキャンセルされました
ja.Enable auto term extraction: 自動用語抽出を有効にする
ja.Download Translation (Dual): 翻訳をダウンロード（双方向）
ja.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: ご利用の API プロバイダーに最適なレート制限モードを選択してください。[没入型翻訳] ボタンをクリックすると、システムが RPM または同時リクエスト数のレート制限値を QPS および Pool Max Workers に自動変換します
ja.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: 例：/no_think あなたはプロの中国語（簡体字）ネイティブ翻訳者であり、テキストを中国語（簡体字）に流暢に翻訳する必要があります。
ja.Custom prompt for the translator: 翻訳者向けのカスタムプロンプト
ja.Character pattern to identify formula te: 数式テキストを識別する文字パターン（正規表現、変更非推奨）
ja.Primary font family for translated text: 翻訳テキストのプライマリフォントファミリー
ja.Download automatically extracted glossar: 自動抽出された用語集をダウンロード
ja.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: 自動用語抽出は無効です。以下の用語抽出設定は、有効になるまで適用されません。
ja.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 数式テキストを識別するためのフォントパターン（正規表現、変更は非推奨）
ja.Disable bilingual output: バイリンガル出力を無効にする
ja.Free translation service provided by [Si: [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn) 提供の無料翻訳サービス

ko.Character pattern to identify formula te: 수식 텍스트를 식별하는 문자 패턴 (정규식, 변경 비권장)
ko.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: OCR 자동 우회 기능 사용 (스캔이 많이 된 문서에 대해 자동 OCR 우회 기능을 활성화합니다)
ko.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: 자동 용어 추출이 비활성화되었습니다. 아래의 용어 추출 설정은 활성화될 때까지 적용되지 않습니다.
ko.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 행 번호가 있는 문서에서 교대로 나타나는 행 번호와 텍스트 단락 처리
ko.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 설정되지 않았거나 0 으로 설정된 경우 QPS 가 작업자 수로 사용됩니다.
ko.Only include translated pages in the out: 출력 PDF 에 번역된 페이지만 포함하세요.
ko.Most API providers provide this paramete: 대부분의 API 제공업체는 이 매개변수를 제공합니다. 예를 들어 OpenAI GPT-4 의 경우 500 RPM 입니다.
ko.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 수식 텍스트를 식별할 글꼴 패턴 (정규식, 변경 비권장)
ko.Put translated pages first in dual mode: 듀얼 모드에서 번역된 페이지를 먼저 표시
ko.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 해결책 (실험적 기능, 백엔드에서 스캔 문서 감지 건너뛰기를 자동으로 활성화함)
ko.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 단락 영역 내 수식이 아닌 줄 제거
ko.RPC service for document layout analysis: 문서 레이아웃 분석용 RPC 서비스 (선택 사항)
ko.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 그림 및 표 보호 임계값 (그림/표 내 선은 처리되지 않음)
ko.Force split short lines into different p: 짧은 줄을 강제로 다른 문단으로 분할
ko.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 파트 당 최대 페이지 수 (자동 분할 번역용, 0 은 제한 없음)
ko.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 처리 중 수식 오프셋 계산 건너뛰기
ko.Split threshold factor for short lines: 짧은 줄에 대한 분할 임계값 계수
ko.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 호환성 향상 (skip_clean 및 disable_rich_text 자동 활성화)
ko.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: PDF 양면 인쇄에 번갈아 사용할 페이지
ko.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: API 공급자에 가장 적합한 속도 제한 모드를 선택하세요. 번역 버튼을 클릭하면 시스템이 RPM 또는 동시 요청에 대한 속도 제한 값을 QPS 및 Pool Max Workers 로 자동 변환합니다.
ko.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: 예: /no_think 당신은 전문적인 한국어 원어민 번역가로서 텍스트를 한국어로 유창하게 번역해야 합니다.
ko.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: 서식 있는 텍스트 번역 비활성화 (호환성 향상 가능)
ko.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 수식이 아닌 줄을 식별하기 위한 IoU 임계값

ru.Character pattern to identify formula te: Символьный шаблон для определения формульного текста (regex, не рекомендуется изменять)
ru.Effective only when a page range is spec: Действительно только при указании диапазона страниц.
ru.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Улучшить совместимость (автоматически включает skip_clean и disable_rich_text)
ru.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Автоматически включать обходное решение для OCR (включить автоматическое обходное решение для сильно отсканированных документов)
ru.Force split short lines into different p: Принудительно разделять короткие строки на разные абзацы
ru.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: Автоматическое извлечение терминов отключено. Настройки извлечения терминов ниже не будут действовать, пока функция не будет включена.
ru.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Отключить перевод в форматированном тексте (возможно, улучшит совместимость)
ru.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Порог IoU для определения строк без формул
ru.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Порог IoU для линий без формулы
ru.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Шаблон шрифта для определения текста формул (regex, не рекомендуется изменять)
ru.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Если значение не задано или установлено в 0, в качестве количества рабочих процессов будет использоваться QPS.
ru.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Максимум страниц на часть (для автоматического разделения перевода, 0 — без ограничения)
ru.Most API providers provide this paramete: Большинство поставщиков API предоставляют этот параметр, например, OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
ru.Put translated pages first in dual mode: В двойном режиме сначала показывать переведённые страницы
ru.Primary font family for translated text: Основное семейство шрифтов для переведённого текста
ru.Only include translated pages in the out: Включать в выходной PDF только переведённые страницы.
ru.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Обработка чередующихся номеров строк и текстовых абзацев в документах с нумерацией строк
ru.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Обходной путь для OCR (экспериментальный, автоматически включит пропуск обнаружения сканированных изображений в бэкенде)
ru.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Пропустить расчет смещения формулы во время обработки
ru.Split threshold factor for short lines: Коэффициент порога разделения для коротких строк
ru.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Использовать чередующиеся страницы для двойного PDF
ru.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: например: /без_мысли Вы профессиональный носитель русского языка, который должен бегло переводить тексты на русский.
ru.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Выберите режим ограничения частоты запросов, который лучше всего подходит для вашего API-провайдера. Система автоматически преобразует значения ограничений RPM или одновременных запросов в QPS и максимальное количество воркеров пула при нажатии кнопки «Перевести».
ru.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Удалить строки без формул в областях абзацев
ru.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Порог защиты для рисунков и таблиц (строки внутри рисунков/таблиц обрабатываться не будут)

es.Character pattern to identify formula te: Patrón de caracteres para identificar texto de fórmulas (regex, no se recomienda cambiar)
es.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Deshabilitar traducción de texto enriquecido (puede mejorar la compatibilidad)
es.Effective only when a page range is spec: Solo tiene efecto cuando se especifica un rango de páginas.
es.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Mejorar compatibilidad (activa automáticamente skip_clean y disable_rich_text)
es.Force split short lines into different p: Forzar la división de líneas cortas en párrafos diferentes
es.Free translation service provided by [Si: Servicio de traducción gratuito proporcionado por [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
es.Minimum text length to translate: Longitud mínima del texto para traducir
es.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Patrón de fuente para identificar texto de fórmulas (regex, no recomendado cambiar)
es.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Umbral IoU de líneas sin fórmula
es.Number of requests sent per second: Número de solicitudes enviadas por segundo
es.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Número máximo de solicitudes procesadas simultáneamente
es.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Activar automáticamente la solución alternativa OCR (habilitar la solución automática OCR para documentos muy escaneados)
es.RPC service for document layout analysis: Servicio RPC para análisis de diseño de documentos (opcional)
es.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Manejar números de línea alternos y párrafos de texto en documentos con numeración de líneas
es.Primary font family for translated text: Familia de fuentes principal para el texto traducido
es.Only include translated pages in the out: Solo incluye las páginas traducidas en el PDF de salida.
es.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: La extracción automática de términos está desactivada. Los ajustes de extracción de términos a continuación no tendrán efecto hasta que se active.
es.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Solución alternativa para OCR (experimental, activará automáticamente Omitir detección de escaneados en el backend)
es.Most API providers provide this paramete: La mayoría de los proveedores de API ofrecen este parámetro, como OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
es.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Máximo de páginas por parte (para traducción automática dividida, 0 significa sin límite)
es.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Poner las páginas traducidas primero en modo dual
es.Remove non-formula lines: Eliminar líneas que no son fórmulas
es.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Si no se establece o se establece en 0, se utilizará QPS como el número de trabajadores.
es.Skip formula offset calculation: Omitir cálculo de desplazamiento de fórmulas
es.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Eliminar líneas que no son fórmulas dentro de las áreas de párrafo
es.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Umbral de protección para figuras y tablas (las líneas dentro de figuras/tablas no se procesarán)
es.Split threshold factor for short lines: Factor de umbral de división para líneas cortas
es.Term rate limit mode: Modo de límite de tasa de término
es.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Omitir el cálculo de desplazamiento de fórmulas durante el procesamiento
es.Term pool max workers: Máximo de trabajadores del grupo de términos
es.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Usar páginas alternas para PDF dual
es.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: p. ej. /no_think Eres un traductor nativo profesional de zh-CN que debe traducir texto con fluidez al zh-CN.
es.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Selecciona el modo de límite de velocidad que mejor se adapte a tu proveedor de API. El sistema convertirá automáticamente los valores de limitación de RPM o Solicitudes Simultáneas a QPS y Máximo de Trabajadores del Grupo cuando hagas clic en el botón Traducir.
es.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Umbral IoU para identificar líneas que no son fórmulas

fr.Character pattern to identify formula te: Modèle de caractères pour identifier le texte de formule (regex, déconseillé de modifier)
fr.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Activer automatiquement le contournement OCR (activer le contournement OCR automatique pour les documents fortement scannés)
fr.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Améliorer la compatibilité (active automatiquement skip_clean et disable_rich_text)
fr.Force split short lines into different p: Forcer la séparation des lignes courtes en paragraphes distincts
fr.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Désactiver la traduction du texte enrichi (peut améliorer la compatibilité)
fr.Free translation service provided by [Si: Service de traduction gratuit proposé par [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
fr.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Modèle de police pour identifier le texte des formules (regex, déconseillé de le modifier)
fr.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Si non défini ou défini sur 0, le QPS sera utilisé comme nombre de workers.
fr.Merge alternating line numbers: Fusionner les numéros de ligne alternés
fr.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Seuil d'IoU pour l'identification des lignes non formules
fr.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Nombre maximum de requêtes traitées simultanément
fr.Pool Max Workers: Nombre maximum de workers du pool
fr.Minimum text length to translate: Longueur minimale du texte à traduire
fr.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Nombre maximum de pages par partie (pour la traduction automatique, 0 signifie sans limite)
fr.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Gérer l'alternance entre les numéros de ligne et les paragraphes de texte dans les documents avec numérotation des lignes
fr.Only include translated pages in the out: N'inclure que les pages traduites dans le PDF de sortie.
fr.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Contournement OCR (expérimental, activera automatiquement Ignorer la détection des documents scannés en arrière-plan)
Sauvegarde de la configuration en cours...
fr.Skip formula offset calculation: Ignorer le calcul du décalage de formule
fr.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): Ignorer le nettoyage (peut-être améliorer la compatibilité)
fr.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Seuil de protection pour les figures et tableaux (les lignes dans les figures/tableaux ne seront pas traitées)
fr.Number of requests sent per second: Nombre de requêtes envoyées par seconde
fr.Effective only when a page range is spec: Efficace uniquement lorsqu'une plage de pages est spécifiée.
fr.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Ignorer le calcul du décalage de formule pendant le traitement
fr.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Placer les pages traduites en premier en mode double
fr.Primary font family for translated text: Famille de polices principale pour le texte traduit
fr.Most API providers provide this paramete: La plupart des fournisseurs d'API fournissent ce paramètre, comme OpenAI GPT-4 : 500 RPM
fr.Term rate limit mode: Mode de limite de débit de terme
fr.RPC service for document layout analysis: Service RPC pour l'analyse de mise en page de documents (optionnel)
fr.Split threshold factor for short lines: Facteur de seuil de division pour les lignes courtes
fr.Skip scanned detection: Ignorer la détection des éléments scannés
fr.Term pool max workers: Nombre maximum de processus du pool de termes
fr.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Utiliser des pages alternées pour un PDF double
fr.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Sélectionnez le mode de limitation de débit qui convient le mieux à votre fournisseur d'API. Le système convertira automatiquement les valeurs de limitation de RPM ou de requêtes simultanées en QPS et en nombre maximum de workers du pool lorsque vous cliquerez sur le bouton Traduire.
fr.Follow main translation engine: Suivre le moteur de traduction principal
fr.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Seuil d'IoU pour les lignes non formulées
fr.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: par ex. /no_think Vous êtes un traducteur natif professionnel zh-CN qui doit traduire couramment des textes en zh-CN.
fr.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Supprimer les lignes non formules dans les zones de paragraphe
fr.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: L'extraction automatique des termes est désactivée. Les paramètres d'extraction de termes ci-dessous ne prendront effet qu'une fois celle-ci activée.

de.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Automatische OCR-Umgehung aktivieren (ermöglicht automatische OCR-Umgehung für stark gescannte Dokumente)
de.Character pattern to identify formula te: Zeichenmuster zur Erkennung von Formeltext (Regex, Änderung nicht empfohlen)
de.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Formatierte Textübersetzung deaktivieren (kann die Kompatibilität verbessern)
de.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: Die automatische Begriffsentnahme ist deaktiviert. Die folgenden Begriffserkennungseinstellungen werden erst wirksam, wenn sie aktiviert ist.
de.Effective only when a page range is spec: Nur wirksam, wenn ein Seitenbereich angegeben ist.
de.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Kompatibilität verbessern (aktiviert automatisch skip_clean und disable_rich_text)
de.Force split short lines into different p: Kurze Zeilen zwangsweise in verschiedene Absätze aufteilen
de.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Wenn nicht festgelegt oder auf 0 gesetzt, wird QPS als Anzahl der Worker verwendet.
de.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Schriftmuster zur Erkennung von Formeltext (Regex, Änderung nicht empfohlen)
de.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: IoU-Schwellenwert für die Identifizierung von Nicht-Formel-Zeilen
de.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Übersetzte Seiten im Dual-Modus zuerst anzeigen
de.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Wählen Sie den Ratenlimit-Modus aus, der am besten zu Ihrem API-Anbieter passt. Das System konvertiert automatisch die Ratenlimit-Werte für RPM oder gleichzeitige Anfragen in QPS und Pool-Max-Worker, wenn Sie auf die Schaltfläche "Übersetzen" klicken.
de.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Maximale Seiten pro Teil (für automatische Teilübersetzung, 0 bedeutet unbegrenzt)
de.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR-Workaround (experimentell, aktiviert automatisch "Gescannte Bilder überspringen" im Backend)
de.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Schutzschwelle für Abbildungen und Tabellen (Zeilen innerhalb von Abbildungen/Tabellen werden nicht verarbeitet)
de.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Verwenden Sie abwechselnde Seiten für doppelseitiges PDF
de.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Berechnung des Formel-Offsets während der Verarbeitung überspringen
de.Term pool max workers: Maximale Anzahl an Arbeitsthreads für Term-Pool
de.Only include translated pages in the out: Nur übersetzte Seiten in die PDF-Ausgabe aufnehmen.
de.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Umgang mit wechselnden Zeilennummern und Textabsätzen in Dokumenten mit Zeilennummern
de.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: z.B. /no_think Sie sind ein professioneller muttersprachlicher Übersetzer für zh-CN, der Texte fließend ins Zh-CN übersetzen muss.
de.Most API providers provide this paramete: Die meisten API-Anbieter stellen diesen Parameter zur Verfügung, z. B. OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM.

it.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Migliora compatibilità (abilita automaticamente skip_clean e disable_rich_text)
it.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: L'estrazione automatica dei termini è disabilitata. Le impostazioni di estrazione termini sottostanti non avranno effetto finché non sarà abilitata.
it.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Attiva automaticamente la soluzione alternativa OCR (abilita la soluzione automatica OCR per documenti pesantemente scansionati)
it.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Se non impostato o impostato a 0, il QPS verrà utilizzato come numero di worker.
it.Effective only when a page range is spec: Effettivo solo se è specificato un intervallo di pagine.
it.Follow main translation engine: Segui il motore di traduzione principale
it.Character pattern to identify formula te: Schema di caratteri per identificare il testo della formula (regex, non è consigliato modificarlo)
it.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Disabilita traduzione testo formattato (può migliorare la compatibilità)
it.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Modello di carattere per identificare il testo delle formule (regex, sconsigliato modificarlo)
it.Minimum text length to translate: Lunghezza minima del testo da tradurre
it.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Soglia IoU per linee non formule
it.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Soglia IoU per l'identificazione delle righe non formule
it.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Rimuovi righe non di formula all'interno delle aree di paragrafo
it.Free translation service provided by [Si: Servizio di traduzione gratuito offerto da [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
it.Split threshold factor for short lines: Fattore di soglia di divisione per righe brevi
it.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Soluzione alternativa OCR (sperimentale, attiverà automaticamente Salta rilevamento scansioni in backend)
it.Only include translated pages in the out: Includi solo le pagine tradotte nel PDF di output.
it.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Numero massimo di pagine per parte (per la traduzione con suddivisione automatica, 0 significa nessun limite)
it.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Gestire numeri di riga alternati e paragrafi di testo in documenti con numerazione di riga
it.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Numero massimo di richieste elaborate simultaneamente
it.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Seleziona la modalità di limitazione della frequenza più adatta al tuo provider API. Il sistema convertirà automaticamente i valori di limitazione RPM o Richieste Concorrenti in QPS e Pool Max Workers quando clicchi sul pulsante Traduci.
it.RPC service for document layout analysis: Servizio RPC per l'analisi del layout dei documenti (opzionale)
it.Primary font family for translated text: Famiglia di caratteri principale per il testo tradotto
it.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Soglia di protezione per figure e tabelle (le linee all'interno di figure/tabelle non verranno elaborate)
it.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Salta il calcolo dello scostamento della formula durante l'elaborazione
it.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Usa pagine alternate per PDF doppio
it.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: ad es. /no_think Sei un traduttore madrelingua it-IT professionista che deve tradurre fluentemente il testo in it-IT.
it.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Metti le pagine tradotte in primo piano in modalità duale
it.Force split short lines into different p: Forza la divisione delle righe brevi in paragrafi diversi
it.Term pool max workers: Numero massimo di worker nel pool di termini
it.Number of requests sent per second: Numero di richieste inviate al secondo
it.Most API providers provide this paramete: La maggior parte dei fornitori di API fornisce questo parametro, come OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM

pt.Auto term extraction is disabled. Term e: A extração automática de termos está desativada. As configurações de extração de termos abaixo não terão efeito até que seja ativada.
pt.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Padrão de fonte para identificar texto de fórmula (regex, não recomendado alterar)
pt.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Ativar automaticamente solução alternativa para OCR (ativar solução alternativa automática para documentos digitalizados pesados)
pt.Minimum text length to translate: Comprimento mínimo do texto para traduzir
pt.Character pattern to identify formula te: Padrão de caracteres para identificar texto de fórmula (regex, não recomendado alterar)
pt.Primary font family for translated text: Família de fontes principal para texto traduzido
pt.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Limiar de IoU para linha não-formulada
pt.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Máximo de páginas por parte (para tradução automática dividida, 0 significa sem limite)
pt.Free translation service provided by [Si: Serviço de tradução gratuito fornecido por [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
pt.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Solução alternativa para OCR (experimental, ativará automaticamente a detecção ignorada de digitalizados no backend)
pt.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Melhorar compatibilidade (ativa automaticamente skip_clean e disable_rich_text)
pt.Only include translated pages in the out: Inclua apenas as páginas traduzidas no PDF de saída.
pt.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Limite de IoU para identificar linhas não relacionadas a fórmulas
pt.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Número máximo de solicitações processadas simultaneamente
pt.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Lidar com numeração de linhas alternadas e parágrafos de texto em documentos com numeração de linhas
pt.RPC service for document layout analysis: Serviço RPC para análise de layout de documento (opcional)
pt.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Colocar páginas traduzidas primeiro no modo duplo
pt.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Limiar de proteção para figuras e tabelas (linhas dentro de figuras/tabelas não serão processadas)
pt.Effective only when a page range is spec: Efetivo apenas quando um intervalo de páginas é especificado.
pt.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Usar páginas alternadas para PDF duplo
pt.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Ignorar cálculo de deslocamento de fórmula durante o processamento
pt.Number of requests sent per second: Número de solicitações enviadas por segundo
pt.Split threshold factor for short lines: Fator de limite de divisão para linhas curtas
pt.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Desativar tradução de texto rico (pode melhorar a compatibilidade)
pt.Most API providers provide this paramete: A maioria dos provedores de API fornece este parâmetro, como OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
pt.Term pool max workers: Número máximo de trabalhadores do pool de termos
pt.e.g. /no_think You are a professional zh: por exemplo: /no_think Você é um tradutor nativo de zh-CN profissional que precisa traduzir textos fluentemente para zh-CN.
pt.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Remover linhas que não são fórmulas dentro de áreas de parágrafo
pt.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Selecione o modo de limite de taxa que melhor se adequa ao seu provedor de API. O sistema converterá automaticamente os valores de limite de taxa de RPM ou Solicitações Simultâneas para QPS e Pool Max Workers quando você clicar no botão Traduzir.
pt.Skip formula offset calculation: Ignorar cálculo de deslocamento da fórmula
pt.Force split short lines into different p: Forçar a divisão de linhas curtas em parágrafos diferentes
pt.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Se não for definido ou definido como 0, o QPS será usado como o número de workers.
pt.Term rate limit mode: Modo de limite de taxa de termo
